meanings.definition: A breed of dog known for its muscular build and distinctive egg-shaped head.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor owns a friendly bullterrier that loves to play fetch.
meanings.sent2: The bullterrier at the dog park was energetic and playful with the other dogs.
meanings.sent3: The bullterrier's egg-shaped head makes it look like it's always ready for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The bullterrier stood proudly, its muscular build a testament to its strength.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the sight of the bullterrier's egg-shaped head and powerful muscles.

meanings.definition: A person who is aggressive or stubborn in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The new employee was a real bullterrier when it came to negotiating deadlines.
meanings.sent2: She can be a bit of a bullterrier when she doesn't get her way.
meanings.sent3: His stubbornness was like that of a bullterrier refusing to let go of a bone.
meanings.sent4: She tackled the project with the determination of a bullterrier on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The bullterrier's aggressive attitude made it clear who was in charge.
